panels.description: Aggregated Kafka broker pods CPU usage
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The average number of records appended per sec as the leader of the raft quorum.
panels.title: Append Metadata Records Rate

panels.description: The average number of records fetched from the leader of the raft quorum.
panels.title: Fetch Metadata Records Rate

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds to commit an entry in the raft log.
panels.title: Metadata Records Commit Latency

panels.description: The current quorum leader's id; -1 indicates unknown
panels.title: Current Quorum Leader

panels.description: The current voted leader's id; -1 indicates not voted for anyone
panels.title: Current Voted Leader

panels.description: The number of bytes read off all sockets per second
panels.title: Metadata Topic Incoming Bytes Rate

panels.description: The number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers per second
panels.title: Metadata Topic Outgoing Bytes Rate

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Metadata Topic Requests Rate

panels.description: The number of responses received per second
panels.title: Metadata Topic Responses Rate

panels.description: The high watermark maintained on this member; -1 if it is unknown.
panels.title: High Watermark

panels.description: The current raft log end offset.
panels.title: Log End Offset
